text: Letter dated 23 December 2015 from the President of the SecurityÂ Council addressed to the Secretary-General

I have the honour to inform you that your letter dated 21 December 2015 (S/2015/1025) concerning your intention to continue the activities of the United Nations support team to the Cameroon-Nigeria Mixed Commission, with funding from the regular budget, has been brought to the attention of the members of the Security Council. They take note of the information contained in your letter and the intention expressed therein.

(Signed) Samantha Power
President of the Security Council
